title: Culture-Centered Nursing Simulation: The Amish Approach to Burn Care

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Cross-Cultural Communication and Customized Treatment Strategy Enhancement Training for In-Service Nurses

learning_goals: Develop an attitude of understanding and respecting treatment preferences of patients from diverse cultural backgrounds.
Perform nursing interventions reflecting the burn treatment needs of Amish patients (e.g., black salve, burdock leaf application) in a VR simulation environment.
Propose practical improvement plans integrating cultural sensitivity and clinical judgment through debriefing.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
